Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: Samco bhandachu (hamila'i) camdako kasama
Ra ratako jaba ki tyasale pachadi hatdacha
Ra pratahkalako jaba ki tyo prakasita bha'ihalos
Niscaya nai narka thulo kuraharumadhye eka ho
Manisaharuko nimti bhayako karana
Timadhye tyasa vyaktiko nimti jo agadi badhna cahancha va pachadi hatna cahancha
Hareka vyakti aphno karmako badalama dhito rakhi'eko cha
Tara dayam hata valaharu
Uniharu svargaharuma baseka hunechan ra prasna garnechan
Aparadhiharusamga
(ki) timila'i kuna kurole narkama lyayo
uniharule javapha dinechan ki hami namaji thi'enaum
Ra na nimukhaharula'i (miskinaharula'i) khana khuva'umthyau
ra hamile vivada garne asatyavadiharuko sathama milera vyasta hune gardathyaum
Ra badalako dina (kiyamata) la'i asatya thahara'umthyau
Yahamsam'ma ki hamila'i mutyu a'ilagyo
Atah uniharuko hakama sipharisa garneharuko sipharisale kunai pha'ida dinechaina
Uniharula'i ke bha'eko cha ki upadesabata mukha pharka'irakheka chan
Jasto ki tarseko gadhaha hun
Jo bagha dekhera bhageka chan
Baru uniharumadhye pratyeka vyakti cahancha ki usala'i khulla kitabaharu di'iyos
Yasto kahilyai hunechaina. (Satyata yo cha ki) uniharu kayamatabata nirbhika chan
Samco kura ta yo ho ki kura'ana e'uta upadesa ho
Aba jasale cahancha tyasabata upadesa hasila garos
Ra tyatikhera nai upadesa hasila garchan jaba allahale cahancha, u yasa yogya cha ki usako bhaya gariyos ra yasa yogya pani ki ksama garos
